item.title: [40k] Bile Blight
item.description:
Instant

Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get -3/-3 until end of turn.

item.title: [40k] Brainstorm
item.description:
Instant

Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

item.title: [40k] Chromatic Lantern
item.description:
Artifact

Lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

item.title: [40k] Assault Suit
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +2/+2, has haste, can't attack you or planeswalkers you control, and can't be sacrificed.

At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, you may have that player gain control of equipped creature until end of turn. If you do, untap it.

Equip {3}

item.title: [40k] Warstorm Surge
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, it deals damage equal to its power to any target.

item.title: [40k] Deny Reality
item.description:
Sorcery

Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

item.title: [40k] Bituminous Blast
item.description:
Instant

Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

Bituminous Blast deals 4 damage to target creature.

item.title: [40k] Reverberate
item.description:
Instant

Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

item.title: [40k] Past in Flames
item.description:
Sorcery

Each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost.

Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [40k] Chaos Warp
item.description:
Instant

The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.

item.title: [40k] Decree of Pain
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated. Draw a card for each creature destroyed this way.

Cycling {3}{B}{B} ({3}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

When you cycle Decree of Pain, all creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

item.title: [40k] Blasphemous Act
item.description:

Blasphemous Act deals 13 damage to each creature.

Creature — Demon

First strike, haste

item.title: [40k] Let the Galaxy Burn
item.description:
Sorcery

Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

Let the Galaxy Burn deals X damage plus 2 damage to each creature that didn't enter the battlefield this turn.

item.title: [40k] Kill! Maim! Burn!
item.description:
Instant

Choose one or more —

• Destroy target artifact.

• Destroy target creature.

• Kill! Maim! Burn! deals 3 damage to target player.

https://twitter.com/PhunkRoyaI/status/1570054864977252352

item.title: [40k] Icon of Ancestry
item.description:
Artifact

As Icon of Ancestry enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.

{3}, {T}: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card of the chosen type from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wTvU04n4dVo

item.description:
Instant

item.title: [40k] Opal Palace
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. If you spend this mana to cast your commander, it enters the battlefield with a number of additional +1/+1 counters on it equal to the number of times it's been cast from the command zone this game.

item.title: [40k] Trygon Prime
item.description:
Creature — Tyranid

Subterranean Assault — Whenever Trygon Prime attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it and a +1/+1 counter on up to one other target attacking creature. That creature can't be blocked this turn.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wTvU04n4dVo

item.title: [40k] Purestrain Genestealer
item.description:
Creature — Tyranid

Purestrain Genestealer enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

Vanguard Species — Whenever Purestrain Genestealer attacks, you may remove a +1/+1 counter from it. If you do, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wTvU04n4dVo

item.title: [40k] Hierophant Bio-Titan
item.description:
Creature — Tyranid

Frenzied Metabolism — As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may remove any number of +1/+1 counters from among creatures you control. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each counter removed this way.

Vigilance, reach, ward {2}

Titanic — Hierophant Bio-Titan can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wTvU04n4dVo

item.title: [40k] Ravener
item.description:
Creature — Tyranid

Flash

Ravenous (This creature enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. If X is 5 or more, draw a card when it enters.)

Whenever Ravener enters the battlefield, target creature attacks target opponent this turn if able.

item.title: [40k] Mawloc
item.description:
Creature — Tyranid

Ravenous (This creature enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. If X is 5 or more, draw a card when it enters.)

Terror from the Deep — When Mawloc enters the battlefield, it fights up to one target creature an opponent controls. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
